src:
Anies Diundang ke Kongres NasDem, Terkait Pilpres 2024?
02 Nov 2019, 08:32 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan diundang menghadiri kongres Partai NasDem yang akan digelar dalam waktu dekat. Apakah terkait Pilpres 2024? NasDem buka suara.
"2024 masih jauh, sementara ini tidak (membahas). By the way, yang namanya politik kan dinamis, setiap saat dinamikanya berubah," ujar Ketua DPP Partai NasDem Irma Suryani Chaniago kepada wartawan, Jumat (1/11).
Irma mengatakan, kapasitas Anies diundang selaku kepala daerah. Terlebih, lokasi kongres berada di Jakarta.
"Anies kan Gubernur DKI Jakarta, dan kita mengadakan kongres di Jakarta, wajar dong kita mengundang beliau," ucap Irma.
text:
Anies Invited to NasDem Congress, Related to Presidential Election 2024?
02 Nov 2019, 08:32 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan was invited to attend the NasDem Party congress which will be held in the near future. Is it related to the 2024 Presidential Election? NasDem open voice.
"2024 is still far away, while it is not (discussing). By the way, the name of politics is dynamic, every time the dynamics change," NasDem Party DPP Chairman Irma Suryani Chaniago told reporters on Friday (1/11).
Irma said that Anies's capacity was invited as regional head. Moreover, the location of the congress is in Jakarta.
"Anies is the Governor of DKI Jakarta, and we are holding a congress in Jakarta, naturally we invite him," said Irma.
